original_text: And thou shalt speak unto the children of Israel, saying, This shall be an holy anointing oil unto me throughout your generations.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 이르기를 이것은 너희 대대로 내게 거룩한 관유니

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt speak unto the children of Israel
saying, This shall be an holy anointing oil
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 나를 위한 거룩한 기름이 될 것이라
